title: Spiritual Medicine and Natural Remedies
cleaned_text: Description This book, the first in a series on healing, describes the spiritual and physical medicine used by the Prophet (salla allahu alayhi wa-salam) to heal diseases of hearts and bodies and to prescribe to others. $20.00 This book, the first in a series on healing, describes the spiritual and physical medicine used by the Prophet (salla allahu alayhi wa-salam) to heal diseases of hearts and bodies and to prescribe to others.
